comments.text: I'm filing this on behalf of one of my friends.  She uses Windows XP, and upgraded to Firefox 4 today.  She told me that when she upgraded to Firefox 4 today, it started in full-screen mode by default, which confused here since she couldn't figure out how to exit that mode.
